type: Best Value (waiver of stipulation of tender closing time)
description: The NRC looking for a mid to senior level career project manager to support the section of Branch Support Services / Health, Safety and Environment.
full_summary:
**Project Manager Level 2 (Part-time Resource)**
==============================

**Reference Number**: cb-7841-8863405
**Solicitation Number**: 23-58040
**Amendment Number**: 3
**Publication Date**: August 2, 2023
** Tender Closing Date**: August 25, 2023, 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date**: September 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2024

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   The National Research Council is seeking a mid-to senior-level Career Project Manager to support the Section of Branch Support Services / Health, Safety and Environment.
*   The selected candidate will be responsible for managing projects and providing guidance and oversight to ensure successful project outcomes.
*   This is a part-time resource position, with a contract duration of one year.
*   The tender is open to all qualified vendors.
*   The tendering method is competitive selective tendering.

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

*   Name: National Research Council
*   Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   Name:  Philippe G. Cléroux
*   Email: <philippe.cleroux@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca>
*   Phone:  613-998-1073

**Documents**
-------------

*   The tender package is available upon request.
*   The tender documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

*   This tender is open to all qualified vendors, and the contract will be awarded to the vendor with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
*   The tender is subject to the applicable trade agreements. Please see the tender documents for more information.

Please note that this is a rewritten and reformatted version of your original text. The content has been reviewed and edited to ensure accuracy and clarity. If you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to ask. 

Please note that I worked within the 400-word limit, if you feel there is still some more information that needs to be added  please let me know so I can be of assistance. 

Let me know if you have any questions or need further clarification on anything. 

I hope this rewritten entry meets your requirements. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to ask! 

SS.  Best
